title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers (with proxy) to interact with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and custom timeout support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps ollama commands with ergonomic shortcuts and fzf model picker.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completions via Ollama (GitHub Copilot-like).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB + Streamlit for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-nvidia-nim
summary: Experimental connector to run Ollama models through NVIDIA NIM micro-services for enterprise scale.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats and generates images using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# .NET client for Ollama with strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-qt-gui
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop GUI for Ollama featuring model browser, chat tabs, and dark theme.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module to spin up Ollama service containers in pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 GPU instances with Cloud-Init user data.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight async Rust crate for Ollama with tokio and serde, published on crates.io.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming support.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig language bindings to Ollama REST API with comptime JSON deserialization.
